name: Nico (Munguía)
description:
Don´t be afraid of the dark, Follow the traditional and primitive sign trail of Nico the  pixel Caveman  to perform his latest pieace of art on the cave.

All graphics in GAME MAKER 8

Available 

.exe pc desk game made with Game Maker 8

Install on Windows made with Game Maker Studio

HTML5 browse version with Game Maker Studio
